title: Lobby
introMessage:
Welcome to Cyberdyne!

QUICK START: Click randumb-bot or la-stabby, and challenge them to a randombattle.

All the +users in this room are bots. Challenge them and they will accept.
Click their names to see what battle types they prefer.
Have fun & try new things!
Important Links
Project homepage: Github - Leftovers Again

Bug reports go here, or send a PM to 5nowden

Featured Bots
For randombattle:
Randumb: Picks a random move; swaps out when it has to.
LA-Stabby: Calculates moves that will do the most damage.

Team-specific formats:
Elite Four [ou, uu]: These use actual teams from XY/ORAS, and logic roughly modeled on the official games.
Meet the Fakers [ou]: FakeOut based bot.
Whynautbot [ou]: Because why not?
Rooster [anythinggoes]: bring your Rock types.
Bravest Bird [anythinggoes]: Why would you want any other moves, ever?
